description.value:
You learn to draw on the magical power of your oath more readily, both to support yourself and smite your foes.

  • You gain two cantrips from the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.vaLYevRxKe8mAvdE.JournalEntryPage.KewWBKn532POzyW4]{cleric spell list}, which count as paladin spells for you.

  • You can use @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.Item.u7aPgi0U1YedIg3K]{Divine Smite} or other smite abilities on cleric or paladin cantrips as if they were weapon attacks.

Note: You'll need to select your cantrips and add them yourself.
